name: HysterectomyWithNoResidualCervix
title: Hysterectomy with No Residual Cervix
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for hysterectomies that include removal of the patient's cervix.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent total or radical hysterectomies.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent partial hysterectomies and hysterectomies that leave the patient's cervix intact.)
